thread.section_title: KeepCalling.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KeepCalling.com | keepcalling.com
thread.title: Meg Johnson

author: Meg Johnson
title: Meg Johnson
text:
Keep Calling is thus far the best app I've used to make international calls and send international texts.
In here you get pretty good rates, Customer Service is great and you can even recharge a mobile number that is overseas.
One of the thinks that can be improved is the amount available for recharging numbers from the D.R. Congo through Orange. I always wondered why but there is not an amount like 2, 5 or 10$ appearing. It starts at around 9.75$. I would have been even happier if there were more choices to choose from.
Other that as stated earlier, this is a great app to use. I encourage you to go ahead, put some voice credits and break any bridges distance may have built between you and your loved ones!
